test_data.Test_Description: Healthy Kidney filter urea and remove other waste products from your blood. The filtered waste products leave your body through urine. A BUN test can reveal whether your urea nitrogen levels are higher than normal, suggesting that your Kidney may not be working properly. If your doctor suspects that you have kidney disease or damage
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Urea is a renal function test that is often interpreted with creatinine. It is useful when measured before and after dialysis treatments.
test_data.Pre_test_information: First morning sample required
test_data.Turn around time: Test is run daily and report is available same day.

test_data.Test_Description: Liver function tests (LFTs) are a group of blood tests that help assess the health of the liver and detect liver damage or disease.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with liver disease symptoms or as part of a routine check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Cholesterol level tests measure the amount of cholesterol in the blood and are used to assess heart disease risk.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with heart disease risk factors or as part of a routine check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Fasting for 9-12 hours is required for accurate results.

test_data.Test_Description: Glucose level tests measure the amount of glucose (sugar) in the blood and are used to diagnose and manage diabetes.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with diabetes symptoms or as part of diabetes management.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Fasting for 8 hours is required for accurate results.

test_data.Test_Description: Thyroid function tests assess the health and function of the thyroid gland, which plays a key role in metabolism and hormone regulation.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with thyroid-related symptoms or as part of thyroid disorder management.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: A complete blood count (CBC) is a blood test that measures various components of the blood, including red and white blood cells and platelets.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for general health check-ups and to diagnose a variety of disorders.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Uric acid level tests measure the amount of uric acid in the blood and are used to diagnose gout and assess kidney function.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with gout symptoms or kidney-related concerns.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: HDL cholesterol tests measure the amount of high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol in the blood, often referred to as 'good' cholesterol.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with heart disease risk factors or as part of a routine check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Fasting for 9-12 hours is required for accurate results.

test_data.Test_Description: LDL cholesterol tests measure the amount of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol in the blood, often referred to as 'bad' cholesterol.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with heart disease risk factors or as part of a routine check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Fasting for 9-12 hours is required for accurate results.

test_data.Test_Description: Bilirubin level tests measure the amount of bilirubin in the blood and are used to diagnose liver and bile duct disorders.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with jaundice or liver-related symptoms.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: HbA1c tests measure the average blood sugar level over the past two to three months and are used for long-term diabetes management.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with diabetes to assess long-term glucose control.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Hemoglobin level tests measure the amount of hemoglobin in the blood and are used to assess anemia and overall health.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with anemia symptoms or general health check-ups.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: The PSA test measures prostate-specific antigen levels in the blood and is used for prostate cancer screening.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of prostate cancer or as part of prostate cancer screening.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Thyroid antibody tests measure the presence of antibodies associated with autoimmune thyroid disorders.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with autoimmune thyroid disease symptoms or thyroid function monitoring.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Albumin level tests measure the amount of albumin in the blood and are used to assess liver and kidney function.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with liver or kidney-related symptoms.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Lipase level tests measure the amount of lipase in the blood and are used to diagnose pancreatic disorders.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with pancreatic-related symptoms.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: TSH tests measure thyroid-stimulating hormone levels in the blood and are used to assess thyroid function.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with thyroid-related symptoms or thyroid disorder management.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Ammonia level tests measure the amount of ammonia in the blood and are used to assess liver function.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with liver-related symptoms or suspected liver disease.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Calcium level tests measure the amount of calcium in the blood and are used to assess bone health and various medical conditions.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with bone-related concerns or as part of a routine check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Magnesium level tests measure the amount of magnesium in the blood and are used to assess magnesium deficiency.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of magnesium deficiency.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: The H. pylori antibody test is used to detect antibodies to the Helicobacter pylori bacteria, which can cause stomach ulcers and gastritis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with gastrointestinal symptoms or suspected H. pylori infection.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Hemoglobin electrophoresis is a blood test that identifies and quantifies different types of hemoglobin in the blood. It's used to diagnose hemoglobinopathies.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with suspected hemoglobin disorders.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: The TSH test measures thyroid-stimulating hormone levels in the blood and is used for thyroid function assessment.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with thyroid-related symptoms or for routine thyroid screening.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Vitamin B12 level tests measure the amount of vitamin B12 in the blood and are used to assess vitamin B12 deficiency.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of vitamin B12 deficiency.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Ferritin level tests measure the amount of ferritin in the blood and are used to assess iron stores in the body.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with iron-related concerns or anemia symptoms.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: A lung function test assesses the capacity and efficiency of the lungs. It is used to diagnose respiratory conditions and monitor lung health.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with respiratory symptoms or lung-related concerns.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Performed at the pulmonary function lab.

test_data.Test_Description: The CA 125 test measures CA 125 levels in the blood and is used as a tumor marker, particularly for ovarian cancer.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for women at risk of ovarian cancer or for monitoring treatment effectiveness.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Amylase level tests measure the amount of amylase in the blood and are used to diagnose pancreatic and salivary gland disorders.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with pancreatic or salivary gland-related symptoms.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Prothrombin time (PT) measures the time it takes for blood to clot. It is used to assess blood clotting disorders and monitor anticoagulant therapy.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with clotting disorders or on anticoagulant medication.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: The HCG test measures human chorionic gonadotropin levels in the blood and is used to confirm pregnancy or assess certain medical conditions.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals seeking to confirm pregnancy or for medical evaluation.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: MRI is a medical imaging technique that uses strong magnetic fields and radio waves to generate detailed images of the body's internal structures.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals needing non-invasive imaging for medical diagnosis.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-MRI instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: An electrocardiogram (ECG or EKG) records the electrical activity of the heart and is used to diagnose heart conditions.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with heart-related symptoms or as part of a cardiac evaluation.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: A bone density scan measures bone mineral density and is used to assess bone health and the risk of osteoporosis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of osteoporosis or bone-related concerns.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Appointment required.

test_data.Test_Description: The CRP test measures C-reactive protein levels in the blood and is used to assess inflammation in the body.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals with signs of inflammation or as part of a general health assessment.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: Vitamin D level tests measure the amount of vitamin D in the blood and are used to assess vitamin D deficiency.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of vitamin D deficiency or as part of a general health check-up.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: HIV screening tests detect the presence of the human immunodeficiency virus and are used for diagnosing HIV infection.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of HIV or as part of routine infectious disease screening.
test_data.Pre_test_information: No special requirements. Can be done at any time of the day.

test_data.Test_Description: A CT scan (computed tomography) is an imaging technique that uses X-rays and computer processing to create detailed cross-sectional images of the body.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals needing detailed imaging for medical diagnosis.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-CT scan instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A mammogram is an X-ray of the breast tissue and is used for breast cancer screening and diagnosis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for women as part of routine breast cancer screening or for diagnostic purposes.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-mammogram instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A DEXA scan measures bone mineral density and is used to assess bone health and the risk of osteoporosis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of osteoporosis or bone-related concerns.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-DEXA scan instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A colonoscopy is a procedure that allows a doctor to examine the inside of the colon and rectum for abnormalities and diseases.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of colorectal issues or as part of routine screening.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Preparation instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A CT scan (computed tomography) is an imaging technique that uses X-rays and computer processing to create detailed cross-sectional images of the body.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals needing detailed imaging for medical diagnosis.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-CT scan instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A mammogram is an X-ray of the breast tissue and is used for breast cancer screening and diagnosis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for women as part of routine breast cancer screening or for diagnostic purposes.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-mammogram instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A DEXA scan measures bone mineral density and is used to assess bone health and the risk of osteoporosis.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of osteoporosis or bone-related concerns.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Appointment required. Follow specific pre-DEXA scan instructions provided by the healthcare facility.

test_data.Test_Description: A colonoscopy is a procedure that allows a doctor to examine the inside of the colon and rectum for abnormalities and diseases.
test_data.Who_is_it_for: Recommended for individuals at risk of colorectal issues or as part of routine screening.
test_data.Pre_test_information: Preparation instructions provided by the healthcare facility.
